Matilda Copeland

  1. Foster Name:
  2. Foster Family: Clarence and Bertha Coeur
  3. Location of Family: Howe, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  5. Arrival Place: Auburn, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 11
  7. Date of Birth: 6/14/1904, Brooklyn, NY
  8. Date of Death: 1/21/1992, NE
  9. Gender: female
  10. Married Name: Matilda (Tilly) Elizabeth Anderson
  11. Spouse Name: Donald Anderson
  12. Source: Nemaha County Herald (Auburn, NE), 5 February 1915; Tri-City Tribune (Cozad, NE), 13 January 1994; 1920 United States Federal Census; 1930 United States Federal Census; 1940 United States Federal Census; Falls City Journal (NE), 23 September 1971; Gravestone, Nemaha Cemetery, Nemaha, NE; Find-A-Grave for Matilda Elizabeth Anderson https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/181951909/matilda-elizabeth-anderson.
